'I was not in charge of Hyale in the last five years, and the emails were lost. I was told that people were given a chance to re-register during that period, but apparently, many didn't receive the email.

I tried to get them back when I acquired Hytale 3 weeks ago, but to no avail. 

Nothing I can do, unfortunately.'

'Correct!

We can't have a first-come, first-served system without causing significant issues. There are hundreds of thousands of people trying to make accounts and reserve their usernames.

We are prioritizing older signups for usernames to be fair, but we don't have all the details because we don't own these emails; they weren't acquired in the Hytale acquisition 3 weeks ago.

We are doing our best with what we have. Some people will be happy, others will be sad. All scenarios end up in the same situation, but this one is the safest and fairest!'

'My Twitter feed looks like 90% @HIDEO_KOJIMA_EN spamming with Death stranding tweets, 9% weird semi-pornographic content forced onto me, and 1% actual art content I'm looking for. Who relates?'
'Yeah, I'm pretty annoyed, too! I wish the emails were intact. It would have made the whole thing way easier to handle! A lot of these people will never know Hytale is back as well, it sucks.'

summary: Simon, re: beta email from march 2024
mainText: 'You are fine. To make extra sure, sign up on the Hytale website as well.'

'Emails from beta sign-ups and the mailing list are handled separately from the email address you use for your Hytale account.

You can claim the name reservation token on any account once you receive it.

Example:
2019: Registered under bob@test.com
Today: Hytale account newbob@test.com

The token you get from bob@test.com can be used on your newbob@test.com Hytale account.'
'For those confused about the beta signups situation around Hytale name reservations please checkout Simons reply below'
'Fix should be out for this, if you wait for the email to come through it should work for ya now'

summary: SImon, re: confusions about email lists
mainText:
'To clear up some confusion: there are 2 email lists, Hytale Beta Signups and Hypixel Newsletter.

The Hytale Beta Signups email list is not within our control; we have limited information and were not given access when we repurchased Hytale IP 3 weeks ago. Riot Games will send that list.

The only information that I have is that there was a re-registration campaign during the time I was not there, between 2020 and 2025. This list is about 65% smaller than what it was in 2020 before I left Hytale.

Just now, after reading your comments tonight, I'm learning that many of you didn't get the re-registration campaign email, so imagine my surprise and frustration, as I have put a lot of value in these emails.

The good news is, we want to make sure the process is as fair as possible for everyone and give people a shot at reserving the names they want. We will provide additional username tokens this week to people who sign up for Hytale accounts directly on the website.

These will come during the email campaign as it rolls out later this week.

Cheers!'
'There was a point where the entire email list was asked to re register, if you did that you should get an email. This would've been around 2023'
'We're testing some fixes for this, looking to have a fixed rolled out ASAP'
'There was a point where the entire email list was asked to re register, if you did that you should get an email.'

summary: DevSlashNull, re: running multiple instances at one time
mainText: 'Yep! '
'We never recommend sharing accounts, it puts your account and game profiles at risk. This is more for you to be able to have different accounts with different names, avatar, cosmetics, etc'
'Backup Codes are coming tomorrow.'
'Yeah sorry I misread the initial tweet. I thought its a verification issue. Getting too tired after this day üòÖ Name reservation tokens will come over the next few days.'
'Okay, so you are verified. The token will then arrive in the coming days if are eligible.'
'When was the last time you requested a verification? The queue is empty, so you should receive it within minutes.'
'We're still investigating, thanks for being patient we hope to have this resolved ASAP'

summary: DevSlashNull, re: accounts being like Runescape
mainText: 'Exactly like that'

summary: DevSlashNull, re: possibility of MC Realms-like system
mainText: 'There will be server providers for day 1, we're working with companies that have been in the server hosting business for years. We don't see any point in us handling this as a 1st party service when there are other companies that can offer the experience we'd want for our players and at a cheaper price. This lets us focus on making the game as great as can be rather than focusing on many different areas to try and serve.'
'For very serious cases we would issue a full account ban that would cover any game profiles in the account.'

summary: Slikey, re: how being banned works
mainText: 'Your profile / game license would be banned, not the entire account. When it concerns the game each profile is a separate identity.'

summary: DevSlashNull, re: verification emails coming late
mainText: 'Thank you, taking a look into this now. Will reach out for some info'

summary: DevSlashNull shares more info about how Hytale accounts work
mainText:
'Some more information about how Hytale accounts work: 

Our accounts system is broken into 2 parts, we have Hytale accounts and game profiles

A Hytale account is used to sign in and is where your authentication methods live. 

A game profile is tied to a username (1 per game profile) and is where your license to play the game is stored along with your avatar and any game specific information. 

This means you can have multiple game profiles under 1 hytale account removing the need to store and track multiple logins to have alt account. 

For example, 
Hytale Account: test@test.com (no hack plz)
Can have under the same account:
Game Profile 1: therealtest (supporter edition)
Game Profile 2: testthereal (curse breaker edition)'
'This should be for emails sent after the tweet, plz give it another shot!'
'We're rolling more changes to make sure that verification emails last the full 24h, please let us know if you still run into issues :)'

summary: Buddha, re: user thanking the team
mainText: 'Cat with flashing heart emoji gif'
'No, you only need access to the old account to receive the token. You can then use it on your Hytale account.'
'The name reservation emails are completely separate from the accounts system, no need to change anything.'

'Seeing a massive number of account creations over the past few hours! That being said, please be patient if you are having issues making an account or receiving a verification email. We are being throttled a bit due to the sheer amount of signups. Very surprising to see that many people are still interested in Hytale, inspiring journey ahead!

The actual username reservation won't start today. It will begin rolling out this week, and then on Saturday (Dec 13th) for pre-orders if you're not on the mailing list, allowing you to secure your username as well.

We have reserved many known creators' names in preparation to avoid impersonation, and we have a mechanism in place to prevent anyone from squatting your username if you are a known creator. More info will follow this week. 
Speaking of which, the Support a Creator rev share program is ready and will be deployed in the coming days for application.

I want everyone to please remember, once again, that this will be a true early access experience. We got the game 3 weeks ago, and we are using an old build from 4 years ago. We have big plans for the future, and we are more than honoured to see you all supporting us!'
'We're looking into this now'
